description:
When packing up your toiletries, those little hard bottles are often the most challenging things to make a home for, and they can be even more annoying when shoving them in a Ziplock at the airport, that’s where these compact soft bottles come in. Much like a soft water bottle, these FlatPak Toiletry bottles squish down as they empty, making packing easier after every use. This three pack has you covered for shampoo, sunscreen, and moisturizer.

  • Welded Cordura® construction
  • 5x lighter and up to 3.5x smaller than its competition
  • Snap loop with a content label
  • Large fill opening reduces waste and makes cleaning easy
  • 90ml capacity is TSA friendly
name: Matador Flatpak Toiletry Bottle 3-Pack
